summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Renton Avenue, from Empire Way to a point 180 feet south of the south margin of Genesee Street; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8224 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
